title: Trailer Park Kids
description: Cadence was only fourteen when she fell in love with Adam. She knew the moment she saw him that he'd be someone that would change her life forever. Womanhood proved to be less glamorous than she had imagined. It was hard. Growing up was heartbreaking. Sometimes the greatest love required the greatest sacrifice, but Cadence had no idea how much it would hurt. She was about to find out what it really meant to be woman and a mother.
author: Venice Cory
